examples.example: 我们要不断探索新的方法来提高工作效率。

translate.english: We should continuously explore new methods to improve work efficiency.

examples.example: 找到适合自己的方法，能让我们的学习过程更加轻松愉快。

translate.english: Finding the method that suits oneself can make our learning process more relaxed and enjoyable.

examples.example: 老师教给我们很多有效的方法来解决数学难题。

translate.english: The teacher taught us many effective methods to solve difficult math problems.
